title: Olivia Nuzzi accuses ex-fiancé of blackmail over 'affair with RFK Jr'
content: After accusing former fiancé Ryan Lizza of harassment and blackmail, Olivia Nuzzi obtained a no-contact order against him. Amid the legal battle, Nuzzi revealed an undisclosed relationship with a subject matter, prompting New York magazine to place her on leave pending a review of her actions while reporting on Kennedy's campaign.
summary: After accusing former fiancé Ryan Lizza of harassment and blackmail, Olivia Nuzzi obtained a no-contact order against him. Amid the legal battle, Nuzzi revealed an undisclosed relationship with a subject matter, prompting New York magazine to place her on leave pending a review of her actions while reporting on Kennedy's campaign.

title: 'Make no mistake, US is fully, fully supportive of Israel': Biden after Iran's missile attack
content: The Biden administration differentiates between Israel's military actions and Iran's missile attack, condemning Iran’s escalation. He also made the administration's stance clear, and warned, "Make no mistake, the United States is fully, fully supportive of Israel." US pledges full support for Israel, lauds the defensive success against the missiles, and monitors the significant escalation while expressing condolences for a related terrorist incident.
summary: The Biden administration differentiates between Israel's military actions and Iran's missile attack, condemning Iran’s escalation. He also made the administration's stance clear, and warned, "Make no mistake, the United States is fully, fully supportive of Israel."  US pledges full support for Israel, lauds the defensive success against the missiles, and monitors the significant escalation while expressing condolences for a related terrorist incident.

title: Two blasts near Israel embassy in Denmark; probe initiated
content: Police investigated two explosions near the Israeli embassy in Copenhagen, occurring amidst heightened Middle East tensions. No injuries were reported, and a potential link to the embassy is being probed. The area also houses other foreign missions, including those of Iran and Turkey.
summary: Police investigated two explosions near the Israeli embassy in Copenhagen, occurring amidst heightened Middle East tensions. No injuries were reported, and a potential link to the embassy is being probed. The area also houses other foreign missions, including those of Iran and Turkey.

title: ‘Border Czar’: JD Vance’s label for Kamala Harris at vice presidential debate explained
content: JD Vance criticised US vice president Kamala Harris as the "border czar" during the vice presidential debate, blaming her for the dismantling of Trump's immigration policies. He claimed this led to increased fentanyl influx, strained resources, and rising housing costs. Harris was tasked with addressing migration root causes but lacked authority to set immigration policy.
summary: JD Vance criticised US vice president Kamala Harris as the "border czar" during the vice presidential debate, blaming her for the dismantling of Trump's immigration policies. He claimed this led to increased fentanyl influx, strained resources, and rising housing costs. Harris was tasked with addressing migration root causes but lacked authority to set immigration policy.

title: 'Trump absolutely thrilled with JD Vance's performance'
content: Donald Trump's senior adviser praised JD Vance's debate performance, reflecting Trump's approval. Trump compared Governor Tim Walz to Kamala Harris, calling both incompetent. Trump used social media to highlight Vance's strength and undermine Walz's credibility through personal attacks and sharp commentary.
summary: Donald Trump's senior adviser praised JD Vance's debate performance, reflecting Trump's approval. Trump compared Governor Tim Walz to Kamala Harris, calling both incompetent. Trump used social media to highlight Vance's strength and undermine Walz's credibility through personal attacks and sharp commentary.

title: 'How many people ...': Elon Musk takes aim at Hollywood amid explosive allegations against Diddy
content: Elon Musk questioned the knowledge of the music industry regarding the growing allegations against Sean 'Diddy' Combs, who faces multiple lawsuits for severe misconduct, including sexual and physical abuse. Attorney Tony Buzbee revealed 120 accusers, including minors, have come forward. Diddy's team has not yet responded to these claims.
summary: Elon Musk questioned the knowledge of the music industry regarding the growing allegations against Sean 'Diddy' Combs, who faces multiple lawsuits for severe misconduct, including sexual and physical abuse. Attorney Tony Buzbee revealed 120 accusers, including minors, have come forward. Diddy's team has not yet responded to these claims.

title: 'I’ve become friends with school shooters': Tim Walz makes bizarre debate gaffe; draws backlash
content: Minnesota governor Tim Walz misspoke during a debate on school shootings, saying he had 'become friends with school shooters,' causing social media uproar. He clarified his emotional experiences with victims' families. Tim Walz emphasised gun control, while Ohio Senator JD Vance focused on enhancing school security. Both condemned school shootings, sharing a brief moment of empathy.
summary: Minnesota governor Tim Walz misspoke during a debate on school shootings, saying he had 'become friends with school shooters,' causing social media uproar. He clarified his emotional experiences with victims' families. Tim Walz emphasised gun control, while Ohio Senator JD Vance focused on enhancing school security. Both condemned school shootings, sharing a brief moment of empathy.

title: US sends warships to Middle East as tension between Israel and Iran escalates
content: Following increased tension in the Middle East, marked by Iran's attack on Israel, the Pentagon has directed the nuclear-powered USS Abraham Lincoln to stay in the region, with USS Harry S. Truman en route. This move ensures a significant US military presence, supporting Israel and countering regional threats. Additional forces include the Wasp Amphibious Group and guided missile destroyers.
summary: Following increased tension in the Middle East, marked by Iran's attack on Israel, the Pentagon has directed the nuclear-powered USS Abraham Lincoln to stay in the region, with USS Harry S. Truman en route. This move ensures a significant US military presence, supporting Israel and countering regional threats. Additional forces include the Wasp Amphibious Group and guided missile destroyers.

title: 'You mean because they had a headache?': Trump controversially downplays impact of Iran's attack on US troops
content: Former President Trump faced questions about his handling of a 2020 Iranian missile strike that caused over 100 US service members to suffer mild traumatic brain injuries. Trump downplayed the injuries, claiming no missiles hit the base, despite reports of affected personnel.
summary: Former President Trump faced questions about his handling of a 2020 Iranian missile strike that caused over 100 US service members to suffer mild traumatic brain injuries. Trump downplayed the injuries, claiming no missiles hit the base, despite reports of affected personnel.

title: Brazil President Lula da Silva's flight faces technical error, returns to Mexico after circling four hours
content: A plane carrying Brazilian President Lula da Silva returned to Brasília safely after circling Mexico City due to a technical issue. Lula, who was attending Mexico's presidential inauguration, was transferred to another aircraft. The Brazilian air force confirmed that safety procedures were followed and the presidential jet consumed fuel before landing.
summary: A plane carrying Brazilian President Lula da Silva returned to Brasília safely after circling Mexico City due to a technical issue. Lula, who was attending Mexico's presidential inauguration, was transferred to another aircraft. The Brazilian air force confirmed that safety procedures were followed and the presidential jet consumed fuel before landing.

title: Immigration, climate change and Middle East: Key takeaways from Walz vs Vance vice presidential debate
content: US Senator JD Vance and Minnesota governor Tim Walz clashed in a high-stakes debate as vice-presidential candidates for Trump and Harris. Key issues included the Middle East, past misstatements, climate change, and immigration. Both candidates emphasized their critiques of each other's running mates, aiming to sway undecided voters ahead of the November 5 election.
summary: US Senator JD Vance and Minnesota governor Tim Walz clashed in a high-stakes debate as vice-presidential candidates for Trump and Harris. Key issues included the Middle East, past misstatements, climate change, and immigration. Both candidates emphasized their critiques of each other's running mates, aiming to sway undecided voters ahead of the November 5 election.

title: It's 'immigrants eating pets' claim once again that causes uproar, leads to muting of mics at vice presidential debate
content: CBS News silenced the microphones of Republicans JD Vance and Democrat Tim Walz during a heated debate about Haitian migrants in Springfield, Ohio. Vance attempted to justify his claims about migration, while Walz refuted them, leading to a fact-check by the moderator.
summary: CBS News silenced the microphones of Republicans JD Vance and Democrat Tim Walz during a heated debate about Haitian migrants in Springfield, Ohio. Vance attempted to justify his claims about migration, while Walz refuted them, leading to a fact-check by the moderator.

title: 'Was wrong about Donald Trump': JD Vance on once comparing running mate to Hitler
content: Ohio Senator JD Vance acknowledged his past criticisms of Donald Trump, now serving as Trump's running mate. He admitted to being wrong, citing Trump's achievements during his presidency and emphasised the importance of honesty and a desire to improve governance moving forward.
summary: Ohio Senator JD Vance acknowledged his past criticisms of Donald Trump, now serving as Trump's running mate. He admitted to being wrong, citing Trump's achievements during his presidency and emphasised the importance of honesty and a desire to improve governance moving forward.

title: 'Knucklehead at times': Tim Walz says 'misspoke' on claim of being in Hong Kong during Tiananmen Square protests
content: Minnesota governor Tim Walz faced scrutiny for inaccurate claims about being in Hong Kong during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests. Reports reveal he was in Nebraska at the time. Admitting his mistake, Walz clarified he only arrived in China that summer. He acknowledged the error, attributing it to getting caught up in rhetoric.
summary: Minnesota governor Tim Walz faced scrutiny for inaccurate claims about being in Hong Kong during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests. Reports reveal he was in Nebraska at the time. Admitting his mistake, Walz clarified he only arrived in China that summer. He acknowledged the error, attributing it to getting caught up in rhetoric.

title: Middle East crisis: Walz blames Trump’s 'fickle leadership', Vance says he ensured 'stability' at vice presidential debate
content: The vice-presidential debate centered on the Middle East crisis, with Democrat Tim Walz advocating for leadership and diplomacy, while Republican JD Vance supported an aggressive deterrence strategy. Walz credited the Biden administration for steady leadership, whereas Vance criticised them for unfreezing Iranian assets. Both provided distinct visions for US foreign policy amid escalating tensions.
summary: The vice-presidential debate centered on the Middle East crisis, with Democrat Tim Walz advocating for leadership and diplomacy, while Republican JD Vance supported an aggressive deterrence strategy. Walz credited the Biden administration for steady leadership, whereas Vance criticised them for unfreezing Iranian assets. Both provided distinct visions for US foreign policy amid escalating tensions.

title: In video: Israeli sky turn into fiery battle zone after Iran launches over 100 missiles
content: Iran launched 180 missiles at Israel, causing minor damage and few injuries but significant psychological impact. Israel warned of potential escalation and vowed retaliation. The attack escalated ongoing tensions involving Hezbollah and Hamas. The US and international community called for an immediate ceasefire.
summary: Iran launched 180 missiles at Israel, causing minor damage and few injuries but significant psychological impact. Israel warned of potential escalation and vowed retaliation. The attack escalated ongoing tensions involving Hezbollah and Hamas. The US and international community called for an immediate ceasefire.

title: Indian American business owners support Trump, feels Republican fund-raiser Jiten Agarwal
content: Jiten Agarwal, CEO of QuantAi, is hosting a significant reception for Donald Trump in Houston, aiming to raise over $5 million. He emphasized the polarized support for Trump within the Indian American community and critiqued the current administration's policies on foreign affairs and domestic issues.
summary: Jiten Agarwal, CEO of QuantAi, is hosting a significant reception for Donald Trump in Houston, aiming to raise over $5 million. He emphasized the polarized support for Trump within the Indian American community and critiqued the current administration's policies on foreign affairs and domestic issues.

title: 'Destabilizing, dangerous force in Middle East': What Kamala Harris said about Iran after missile attack on Israel
content: Kamala Harris underscores Iran as a destabilizing Middle East force while vowing unyielding support for Israel's security. Her statements follow Iran’s ballistic missile attack on Israel, a response to Israel’s military actions in Lebanon. Tensions rise as international scrutiny grows over Israel’s actions in Gaza.
summary: Kamala Harris underscores Iran as a destabilizing Middle East force while vowing unyielding support for Israel's security. Her statements follow Iran’s ballistic missile attack on Israel, a response to Israel’s military actions in Lebanon. Tensions rise as international scrutiny grows over Israel’s actions in Gaza.

title: Bangladesh says keen on good ties with Pakistan but won't forget 1971
content: Bangladesh expresses a desire for good relations with Pakistan, contingent on acknowledging and apologizing for the 1971 atrocities. Foreign affairs adviser Md Touhid Hossain clarifies that Bangladesh’s current stance remains unchanged, emphasizing the importance of addressing historical issues for improved diplomatic ties.
summary: Bangladesh expresses a desire for good relations with Pakistan, contingent on acknowledging and apologizing for the 1971 atrocities. Foreign affairs adviser Md Touhid Hossain clarifies that Bangladesh’s current stance remains unchanged, emphasizing the importance of addressing historical issues for improved diplomatic ties.

title: Iran launches 200 missiles at Israel as crisis escalates
content: In retaliation to the killings of militant leaders, Iran launched up to 200 missiles at Israel, causing sirens to sound across the nation and injuries in central Israel. Iran's Revolutionary Guards warned of further destructive responses if Israel retaliates. Israeli officials have vowed consequences, asserting plans for their own strategic response.
summary: In retaliation to the killings of militant leaders, Iran launched up to 200 missiles at Israel, causing sirens to sound across the nation and injuries in central Israel. Iran's Revolutionary Guards warned of further destructive responses if Israel retaliates. Israeli officials have vowed consequences, asserting plans for their own strategic response.
